item.description:
Come join me and others for dinner at Bistro Chi/Kama Lounge in Quincy. Tapas and Small Plates are the delight on the menu.  "Inventive and eclectic tapas make for "great" light sustenance at this "casual" but "slick lounge  in Quincy Center, " which also delivers specialty cocktails in it's black-and-gold environment. www.kama-lounge.com East meets West at new Quincy dining spot. 

There's a block in Quincy Center that's fast becoming a discerning diner's dream. And the new kids on it have arrived with flair. Bistro Chi and Kama Lounge, Tapas and Bar share one door into two worlds of imaginative cuisine, alternative decor and a shared kitchen where the joy of preparing good food bridges cultural divides.

BISTRO CHI is located inside the entrance off to the right. 

Directions from the T: Take the red line to Quincy Center and walk down Hancock Street towards South Shore Bank or Stop and Shop.  Take left on to Dennis Ryan Parkway (it's off to the far left)  Kama Lounge/Bistro Chi is about two blocks down on the corner of Cottage St. and Dennis Ryan Parkway.

Parking is on the street or in the back of the restaurant.
item.how_to_find_us: I will be waiting inside the entrance.
item.name: Dinner at Bistro Chi/Kama Lounge
